Game.Name: Double Game! - Golden Nugget Casino & Texas Hold 'em Poker (Europe)
Game.plot: Golden Nugget Casino / Texas Hold 'Em Double Pack is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Various and published by Majesco Games,which was released in 2005.Cheat: Play as Phil Helmuth at all the tournamentsUse these passwords to play as Phil Helmuth.Cheat: Type 1XCBv#dbbbxbM in Password on the main menu.Cheat: Play as "Phil" at every event included on Texas Hold 'Em Poker*note (lowercase r,l,u,d in password stands for right arrow, left arrow, up arrow, down arrow)
